originalText.text: This agency has given me peace of mind. The care they have given my mother is amazing. The professional staff is amazing from the care at home to the administrators. Zabrina Gonzalez, Alicia Rodriguez, Mrs. Farrow. Thank you for caring so much.

text.text: This agency has given me peace of mind. The care they have given my mother is amazing. The professional staff is amazing from the care at home to the administrators. Zabrina Gonzalez, Alicia Rodriguez, Mrs. Farrow. Thank you for caring so much.

originalText.text:
I’m so delighted to leave this review. From the beginning to end Ms. Dulcely  Was very helpful. Having to take care of my mom who has dementia I knew nothing. I called the agency Ms.Dulcely Returned my called from the referral from that point on she instrumental with my process. I appreciate when people come to work and know and do their job well. Dealing with elderly people and their families can be overwhelming, however she does it so well for that Ms.Dulcely I Thank you wholeheartedly
Sincerely,
A grateful daughter

originalText.text: My name is Ramon Sanchez-Tiben, I have been with House Call Home Care Agency for approximately two years and currently looking to move this agency has few home caregivers. When you try to make a call to one of the coordinators they never answer the phone you leave a message and they never return the message some of the age or inexperience and not HHA qualified. I know this because one of the aids that I have now in pursuit of a transferring to a new agency. The new agency found that this current day is been working with an illegal Social Security number therefore has no HHA certificate. I would not recommend this agency to anyone. My aids have had problems with their paychecks. I was shorted. Clocking in properly and then the agency telling them that they need a timesheet. In order to get paid. I receive 15 hours of service every seven days a week for the last four months I haven’t had service in the morning.  MyCoordinator, whose name is Abel, never return the phone call you can’t leave a message is mailboxes usually full. If you leave a message through the operator, you never return the phone call you can never find this guy he should be terminated immediately!

originalText.text: We have a fabulous aide who does her job with joy, diligence and professionalism. We are so grateful to House Calls and couldn’t be happier!

text.text: We have a fabulous aide who does her job with joy, diligence and professionalism. We are so grateful to House Calls and couldn’t be happier!

originalText.text: I would like to say Dulcely has provided excellent customer service. All responses were answered professionally and was very patient with me in helping me find what I was looking for. She took time to answer all of my questions and she has an excellent communication!
